verses.text: To you who dwell in heaven have I lifted up my eyes.

Behold, as the eyes of servants \add are directed\add* to the hands of their masters, \add and\add* as the eyes of a maidservant to the hands of her mistress; so our eyes \add are directed\add* to the Lord our God, until he have mercy upon us.
Have pity upon us, O Lord, have pity upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.

\add Yes\add*, our soul has been exceedingly filled \add with it\add*: \f + \fr 122:4 \fl Or, \ft we are the reproach of them that are at ease. \f* \add let\add* the reproach \add be\add* to them that are at ease, and contempt to the proud.
